attributes.action: close the subsidised bars in the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To the person who rejected my petition - if this outside the remit/powers of the Prime Minister and MPs who sit in the House of Commons, can you suggest how exactly I am supposed to "communicate" this "directly to Parliament" if I cannot communicate it to the elected representatives who sit there? Who would I address it to then?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
